title: Observation collection
description: Collection of observations which may have a common (a) feature of interest (b) observed property (c) observation procedure.

id.title: id
id.description: A unique identifier for the observation collection

featureOfInterest.title: featureOfInterest
featureOfInterest.description: the single feature which all observations in the collection are concerned with

procedure.title: featureOfInterest
procedure.description: the observation procedure used in all observations in the collection

observedProperty.title: observedProperty
observedProperty.description: the property measured or estimated by all observations in the collection
